snippet: This investigation, initiated by the commander of the Marine Corps Training Depot at Parris Island, found that Colonel Germano, the commander of the women’s training battalion, created a “hostile, repressive, and unprofessional command...
lead_paragraph: This investigation, initiated by the commander of the Marine Corps Training Depot at Parris Island, found that Colonel Germano, the commander of the women’s training battalion, created a “hostile, repressive, and unprofessional command climate.”

headline.main: The Marine Corp’s Command Investigation Into Alleged Abuse of Authority by Lt. Col. Kate Germano

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
